name: Slider Version 1.52
description:
INFINITE LEVEL NOW IN THE GAME!

2 PLAYER BATTLE MODE COMING SOON!

This is a fast paced 3d "runner" game where you slide to the left or right and avoid the black boxes. This is my first game using Unity and I will continue to upload new levels, challenges,  hats and more until I believe that the game is complete.

*NOTE; there is a bug where sometimes you wont move when spawning in a level. Press escape twice to start the level until I fix this bug in a future update* 

In the upcoming updates;

  • More Levels
  • More customization options
  • An infinite level
  • More Power Ups
  • More EVERYTHING!

If you have any suggestions or would like to help out with audio please contact me;

minidev22@gmail.com

Thank you for you're time and I hope you enjoy the game!

-MiniDev
